name: EmojiTactics
description:
Hello

EmojiTactics is an turn-based tactical combat game for mobile. It works offline, too: just go to the main site and select "Add to homescreen" from your browser's menu

The Basics

Read this section first. Return to the reference sections as necessary.

  • Two teams of emoji units battle in an encounter.
  • Each team has a leader(⭐). A team loses when its leader dies.
  • The two teams take turns performing actions or passing.
  • When both teams pass in succession, all movement (👟) is restored and all abilities are re-enabled.
  • When two units engage (⊹), each unit deals damage (🗡) to the other's hearts (❤️) and both units' movement (👟) is lost.
  • A unit cannot engage (⊹) a unit that has more movement (👟) than it does.
Encounter Reference
  • ⭐ Leader background. In an encounter, each team has a leader. When the leader dies, that team loses.
  • ⊹ Engage. Use this ability to make two units deal damage to each other.
  • 🗡 Piercing damage. Breaks one heart (❤️).
  • ❤️ Heart. Measures how much damage the unit can take.
  • 💔 Broken heart. When a unit has only broken hearts remaining, it dies.
  • 👟 Movement. You cannot engage a unit that is faster than you.
  • 🦋 Flight movement. Counts as one movement (👟). However, regular movement cannot be used to engage a unit with flight movement.
  • 🛑 Blocker. Prevents non-flying units from engaging units other than this one.
  • 🤕 Heal action. Restores one broken heart (💔).
  • 🛡 Armor. Each protects the unit from one piercing damage (🗡).
  • 👊 Impact damage. Ignores armor.
  • 🔥 Fire damage. Ignores armor.
  • ⚡ Electrical damage. Ignores armor. Disables all special abilities on the target for the current round.
  • 🗡💨 Charge damage. Deals one piercing damage (🗡), plus one additional damage (🗡) for each movement the engager is faster than the target.
  • 🏹 Ranged damage. This ability deals the displayed damage directly to a target, without receiving any damage from the targeted unit.
  • 🍄 Growth. This unit will gain one new heart each time a unit dies.
  • 🌪️ Ranged wind attack. Removes all movement from from the target. Deals one point of impact (👊) damage if the target is capable of air movement.
  • 🕸️ Web. Removes all movement from an opposing unit. Does not affect abilities, however.
  • ❄️ Freeze damage. Removes all movement from an opposing unit and drains all abilities.
  • 👀 This ability refreshes the unit's movement and abilities. Can be used only once per round.
  • X⤵️ Placing action. Grants a certain advantage to another friendly unit.
  • X* Spawn action. Creates a new friendly unit.
  • X¹ One-time use. This ability can only be used once per game.
  • X† Sacrifice. Use of this ability destroys the unit performing it.
  • X⸩ This ability affects all units on the opposing team
  • ⸨X⸩ This ability affects all units (both friendly and opposing)
  • 🎭 Masquerade. This ability turns the acting unit into a copy of any target unit, but with only a single heart (❤️).
  • 💘 Charm. This ability turns a target opposing unit into a friendly unit. The charm ability is disabled on the first round of an encounter.
UI Reference
  • 💰 Money. Used to purchase upgrades for your leader.
  • 👥 Select team. Use this to change the units in your team, subject to available space.
  • 🎒 Space. Space lets you take more units with you.
  • ❱ Next. Move to the next screen, acknowledge the current action, or pass on your turn.
  • ❰ Back. Go to the previous screen.
  • ⏏ Stop. Abort the current encounter.
  • 💥 Reset game. Reset the game to its initial state. You will lose all your saved progress.
